title: Sordid Tales: A Collection Of Male Fantasies About Women
description: Men and Women. These stories reflect a horny male's fantasies about the women he knows and doesn't know, the women he wishes he knew and the women he's afraid to know. In these pages, you'll meet a very caring landlady, a runaway who knows how to show gratitude for a little compassion, a high-priced hooker who's pressed for time, a beautiful office manager who carpools with three guys from the sales department, the ideal mother-in-law, a man and a woman who enjoy each other's company for an all-night bus ride, two very special room-mates, a woman who can't even stay faithful to her husband on her wedding night; a realtor who will do whatever it takes to close a deal and a priest who dedicates himself to saving the women of his parish.... even if it costs him his soul! Enjoy ten new tales of heterosexual lust by a new voice in erotica.
author: D.R.M. Weaver
